GitAuthFailed.other:
Git authentication failed: {{.URL}}

Please check:
  - HTTPS: run 'git credential-manager configure'
  - SSH: ensure your SSH key is added to ssh-agent

InvalidPluginIdentifier.other: Invalid plugin identifier '{{.Identifier}}'. Expected format: plugin@marketplace

NoMarketplaces.other: No marketplaces registered. Use 'codex-market add <git-url>' to add one.

TUIHeader.other: {{.Count}} plugins | [*] installed | [+] to install | [-] to uninstall

TUIPreviewEmpty.other: Select a plugin to see details

NoPluginsAvailable.other: No plugins available in registered marketplaces

SkillNameConflict.other: Note: Skill '{{.Original}}' already exists, installing as '{{.Resolved}}'

PromptNameConflict.other: Note: Command '{{.Original}}' already exists, installing as '{{.Resolved}}'

AlreadyInstalled.other: '{{.Plugin}}' is already installed in {{.Scope}} scope. Use 'codex-market plugin update' to update.

update.prompt.other: Do you want to update now?

update.partialSuccess.other: Some updates completed. Check the errors above.

alias.prompt.other: Would you like to replace the codex command with an auto-updating version?

alias.confirm.other: Add alias to your shell config file?

alias.option.yes.desc.other: Add alias to shell config and enable auto-update

alias.option.no.desc.other: Skip alias setup and run codex directly

alias.reload.other: Run the following to apply changes

alias.alreadyExists.other: ⚠️  Alias is already set up. Skipping.

alias.unsupportedShell.other: Your shell does not support automatic alias setup. Please add the following alias to your shell config file manually:

alias.configPathFailed.other: Failed to get shell config path

mode.notify.desc.other: Shows notification when updates are available and asks Y/N

mode.disabled.desc.other: Does not check for updates automatically
